articles.title: Iran’s nuclear facilities damaged but not destroyed, experts say - The Washington Post
articles.summary: Iran’s nuclear facilities damaged but not destroyed, experts say By Karen DeYoung, Nilo Tabrizy, Evan Hill and Warren P. Strobel The comments reflect skepticism and concern about the effectiveness of Israel's airstrikes on Iran's nuclear facilities, particularly given that key sites like Fordow remain intact. Some commenters advocate for more aggressive measures, such as using bunker buster bombs, while. .....

articles.title: Air India black box recovered after crash that killed 241 onboard and several others on the ground - Politico
articles.summary: Air India black box recovered after crash that killed 241 onboard and several others on the ground Investigators hope the device will provide clues about the cause of the accident that killed 241 passengers and crew, and a number of others on the ground. Police personnel work at the site of an Air India plane crash in Ahmedabad, India, Friday,...
